header: Contentious litigation in tax and administrative matters
text: An efficient corporate strategy must consider the analysis of the legal and tax effects of operations, which allows companies to make business decisions with the necessary legal support, in order to achieve a forceful tax defense before the corresponding authorities. To do this, we have a team of experienced lawyers, through which we offer the analysis, development and implementation of defense strategies against administrative, provisional or definitive acts, including tax credits. Nowadays, it is essential to involve the advisor from the beginning of the verification powers, in order to achieve a consistent and comprehensive defense.
